item.title: SQLBolt - Introduction
item.description: Link to lessons. Introduction to SQL What is SQL? Structured Query Language is a language used to create, maintain, and use relational databases. Thousands of applications from simple projects to Microsoft products use SQL through various formats and configurations. Some use SQLite, MySQL, Postgres, Oracle, or Microsoft SQL, to name a few. Each use SQL as base, and include features that garner appeal from different developers. Relational Databases A relational database is a collection of 2D tables that are linked through some key value.
